section.title: Cannot find suitable emulator for x86_64
Problem
section.para: When you attempt to create a VM, the error shows the VM is in the BUILD then ERROR state.

section.title: Solution
section.para: On the KVM host, run cat /proc/cpuinfo. Make sure the vmx or svm flags are set.
Follow the instructions in the Enable KVM section in the OpenStack Configuration Reference to enable hardware virtualization support in your BIOS.
